attributes.action: Ensure Prime Minister candidates have the necessary experience and character.
attributes.background: The next Prime Minister will not be appointed by the British public. As such, we ask that all potential candidates are properly vetted - both on their professional experience and character. All candidates must be able to clearly demonstrate that they are selfless, caring, organised and decisive.

rejection.details: The vetting of candidates for the leadership of the Conservative party is the repsonsibility of that party, not the Government or Parliament.
